column4: i saw a video on youtube about rotating cube thing for multiple desktops .. i am trying to do it in Live CD session right now .. is it possible, if yes, how ?
frank .. erm ok .. i think i will skip it .. my first 5 mins in linux ocean .. still trying to keep my head above water
You also need to enable restricted drivers
YEs, you can do it... but for a live session, may be more work than you want to do..
